service.name: createPartyRole
service.description: Create a Party Role (add a Role to a Party). The logged in user must have PARTYMGR_CREATE or have permission to change the role of this partyId

service.name: createEmployee
service.description: Create an Employee its role and contact details

service.description: Create a New Internal Job Posting

service.name: cancelSeparation
service.description: Cancel Process of separating an employee

service.name: sendMailNow
service.description: Send E-Mail Service. partyId and communicationEventId aren't used by sendMail but are passed down to storeEmailAsCommunication during the SECA chain. See sendMailInterface for more comments.

service.description: Send E-Mail Service. partyId and communicationEventId aren't used by sendMail but are passed down to storeEmailAsCommunication during the SECA chain. See sendMailInterface for more comments.

service.description: Send E-Mail Service. partyId and communicationEventId aren't used by sendMail but are passed down to storeEmailAsCommunication during the SECA chain. See sendMailInterface for more comments.

service.name: sendScheduledEmailNotificationToStaff
service.description: Send E-Mail Service. partyId and communicationEventId aren't used by sendMail but are passed down to storeEmailAsCommunication during the SECA chain. See sendMailInterface for more comments.
